phrases: The moon is about to disappear.
I wish that I can stay by Master Sesshomaru forever and ever.
Even the moon has days when it can hide in darkness.
But with Naraku holding on to my heart,
there is nowhere for me to run.
The demon spirits that Naraku kept around him...
They have gone through the barrier!
My body will not hold up!
Even the wolves are out of breath.
If I had to wait for you,
we would not reach Naraku's castle even in a hundred years!
You were not just running around here and there?
I will attack his castle and kill him!
I will avenge my comrades who were tricked and slaughtered.
Is not it in this direction?
Is not it useless to sniff the ground to find Naraku's castle?
Inuyasha's nose is not working now.
The night of the new moon!
Tonight, Inuyasha loses his powers and becomes a mortal.
Inuyasha, let us not do anything rash tonight.
Even if we find Naraku's castle,
without your powers, you cannot fight.
That is what you get for sniffing the ground.
So you followed the smell, too?
Koga, did you come to find Naraku's castle?
I do not know what it is,
but I am getting strong whiffs of Naraku's foul smell.
The barrier around Naraku's castle is weakened.
In any case, if I follow this smell, I will find his castle.
I am not the one you want...
I am going to settle it today, once and for all!
Somehow, you do not stink like you usually do.
Didja take a soak in the river?
Do not get close to my Kagome!
If you are jealous, try separating us!
Caught up with you at last!
Oh yeah, I have no time for this.
We are in a rush, so good-bye!
No, better not to do anything tonight.
He is going to beat us to it!
do you want Naraku to see you in your human form?
If he learns about the day that a half-demon loses his powers,
your life will be in danger!
And if Naraku is the enemy, you have to be even more careful!
What a time... when Naraku's smell is all over the place!
All the vassals who were brought here to this castle...
have been exposed to Naraku's toxic barrier and died.
Sneaking up from behind like that!
He is Koga, the leader of the Wolf-Demon Tribe.
Kanna, does Naraku know about this?
Naraku disappears once in a while.
I will go and kill him.
No need to wait for Naraku's orders.
I hate Naraku's way of stooping to trickery.
I will kill anyone who has Sacred Jewel shards.
Who needs a plan of action?
It is all in Naraku's hand... life and death.
The smell is strongest right here.
It has to be around here.
They are the guards of the castle.
There are countless numbers of them.
I have not forgotten your despicable face, not for one day!
After all, you are the one who killed my comrades!
It is payback time for all you did!
I barely missed taking your Sacred Jewel shards.
I will get them this time, for sure.
It will be easy shutting down Koga's speed.
I will let him dance for me.
Let the skeletons in the whirlpool cut you into bits...
Or jump out and be slain by me.
It does not matter to me.
Even Koga does not have a chance in that!
- But we are not strong enough...
If we can take away that powerful fan of hers...
So get up close and steal it away!
She will notice me before I get close
and I will be cut into bits!
But to fight Kagura and that wind...
I think we should at least verify the castle's whereabouts.
But we cannot take Inuyasha in his state.
So Miroku and I can go.
And if Inuyasha will not listen,
we will have Kagome make him sit,
then we can knock him out to keep him quiet.
So l just thought if I flattered him,
he would not become curious about your sense of smell.
Still, your eyes were all sparkly!
You tend to get too chummy with that wild animal.
The Wolf Demon Tribe are here again.
A-And... it does not look too good.
Inuyasha, you must not show yourself.
I do not intend to go help Koga.
that means Naraku's castle is nearby.
But Naraku had put up a barrier to prevent us from getting close.
I guess we have to go and check.
You want to keep your mortal state a secret, do not you?
If you reveal what you see, I will kill you!
I can smell blood in the air.
No matter how many bones I destroy, there are countless more.
And my strength will not hold up against these blades.
Maybe I will let him out.
If he is in too many pieces, I will have a hard time finding the shards.
No need to worry about that!
Is what I would like to say...
You can jump or run... but you cannot escape my wind!
I am taking the two shards from your legs.
Now you are just an ordinary demon.
So... it is time for the finishing blow.
The Sacred Jewel shards were removed from your legs!
I will tend to you right away.
He is going to die anyway!
Getting cut up by the likes of Kagura!?
I suspected Inuyasha was just a half-demon...
I heard that half-demons fear for their lives...
And when they are in the mortal state, they never appear before an enemy.
You are pretty gutsy... coming around me looking like that.
Now that you know my secret...
I will finish you off right here!
This is an ointment I brought from my country.
It works well on sword cuts.
Not only Koga, but even Inuyasha approached the castle.
That means Naraku's barrier is weakened.
Yeah... why should I hand them over to Naraku?
Now is the time to escape...
Now when Naraku's barrier is weak.
Your heart is in my hands!
I can easily turn you back into mere flesh.
You are merely a part of my flesh.
I created you out of me.
I cannot escape from his grasp.
He has the power to sever the bond between me and Naraku!
Lately, Lord Sesshomaru does things that even I, his vassal, cannot fathom.
She is ignorant of my concerns...
The smell of that fellow who was so rude to you...
Did you follow Naraku's scent, too?
This woman is the one Naraku created from his body...
I am glad you remembered me.
Take your hand off your sword.
I did not come here to fight.
Sesshomaru, I want to make a deal with you.
I will give these Sacred Jewel shards to you.
So you will betray me, Kagura?
So you are also a half-demon who loses his powers at times.
Did you think you could escape my clutches?
I will live freely like the wind.
Next on Inuyasha: The Howling Wind of Betrayal
I saw you, Inuyasha... as a mortal!
